sections.title: Why Work at Boston Pizza House?
content: At Boston Pizza House, we're more than just a restaurant - we're a family. Our team members are the heart of our operation, and we believe in creating a positive, supportive work environment where everyone can thrive.
We offer competitive wages, flexible scheduling, and opportunities for growth and advancement. Many of our managers and shift leaders started as entry-level team members and worked their way up.

items.title: Competitive Pay
items.description: Starting wages above minimum wage with regular performance reviews and raises

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.description: We work around your school and life schedule - perfect for students!

items.title: Free Meals
items.description: Enjoy a free meal during your shift and 50% off when you're not working

items.title: Career Growth
items.description: Clear advancement opportunities from crew to management positions

items.title: Training Program
items.description: Comprehensive paid training to ensure your success

items.title: Team Environment
items.description: Work with a fun, supportive team that feels like family

positions.title: Pizza Cook
positions.description: Prepare delicious pizzas using our traditional recipes and wood-fired ovens. Training provided for all skill levels.
requirements: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Food safety knowledge preferred but not required

positions.title: Server / Cashier
positions.description: Provide excellent customer service by taking orders, serving food, and ensuring customer satisfaction.

positions.title: Delivery Driver
positions.description: Deliver hot, fresh pizzas to our customers while representing our brand with excellent service.

positions.title: Kitchen Manager
positions.description: Lead our kitchen team, ensure food quality, manage inventory, and maintain our high standards.

sections.title: How to Apply
content: Ready to join our team? We're always looking for passionate, hardworking individuals who share our commitment to quality and customer service.
You can apply in person at our restaurant, or send your resume to the email address below. We review applications on a rolling basis and will contact qualified candidates within a week.

applicationInfo.inPerson: Visit us at 123 Hanover Street, Boston, MA 02113
applicationInfo.bestTimes: Best times to apply in person: Tuesday-Thursday, 2:00-4:00 PM

companyValues.title: Quality First

companyValues.title: Team Spirit
